description:
Animated Presentation Maker


Interactive components: Added new image interactive components.
Export: Added new feature to export images.
Export: Added video export feature in mov format.
Interface: User information interface upgrade.
Material: New digital human characters.
Material: Optimized the graphic content of commonly used graphics and added a search feature.
Role: Added custom role feature to support users to add and customize their own roles.
Operation: Added right-click on the canvas to add the layer selection feature.
Operation: Elements added by users can be copied and pasted into other software.
Template: Some templates have Chinese fonts.
Publish to the Cloud: Some projects have encountered abnormal issues when uploading to the Cloud.
